creditline: Gift of Beverly and John Rollwagen
description: six girls and young women, all with their hair in pairs of buns and wearing dark skirts, light-colored leggings and moccasins and light-colored blankets with dark stripes at each end, standing by and sitting on rocks in a rocky, desert landscape
inscription:
Title, Date and Inscription

ULC, printed in brown: [Plate 427]
signed: in lower margin, printed in brown: [EAST MESA GIRLS  From Copyright Photograph 1921 by E.S. Curtis  Photogravure Suffolk Eng. Co. Boston]
title: East Mesa Girls
